price: 136. Bango wana nde lifuta na bango ezali bolimbisi kowuta epai ya Nkolo na bango, mpe baparadizu wapi epai mingala mizali kotiola, bakozala libela na kati, oyo nde lifuta ya basali malamu.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَجَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَنِعۡمَ أَجۡرُ ٱلۡعَٰمِلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ulāika jazāuhum maghfiratun min rabbihim wajannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā waniʿ'ma ajru al-ʿāmilīna
